SELECT A1 hour,IFNULL(info.counts,0) total FROM st_online_info com LEFT JOIN(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TIME,'%H') hours,COUNT(DATE_FORMAT(TIME,'%H')) counts FROM st_sys_log GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(TIME,'%H')) info ON com.`A1`=info.hours
